def_en: When a coloured object fades or when the light fades it, it gradually becomes paler.

def_cn: (光线)逐渐暗淡;(声音)逐渐减弱
def_en: When light fades, it slowly becomes less bright. When a sound fades, it slowly becomes less loud.

def_cn: (所注视之物)逐渐暗淡，逐渐模糊直至消失
def_en: When something that you are looking at fades, it slowly becomes less bright or clear until it disappears.

def_cn: 变得不为人注意;变得无关紧要
def_en: If someone or something fades, for example, into the background, they become hardly noticeable or very unimportant.

def_cn: (记忆)逐渐模糊;(感情)逐渐变淡;(可能性)逐渐变小
def_en: If memories, feelings, or possibilities fade, they slowly become less intense or less strong.
If someone's smile fades, they slowly stop smiling.

def_cn: 淡出;变得不再引人注目(直至完全消失)
def_en: When something fades out, it slowly becomes less noticeable or less important until it disappears completely.

def_cn: (光线)逐渐暗淡;(画面)淡出; (声音)渐弱
def_en: When light, an image, or a sound fades out, it disappears after gradually becoming weaker.
